item.title: Useful Linux Commands
item.description: In this post, I want to list some useful shell scripts/commands, keyboard shortcuts , some may be already known to you and some may not be, but nonetheless I feel its my duty to share some not so trivial things to search and find that easily sometimes, also I needed a quick reference of these which may be useful for Linux System Admin, coders including me in future, so here we go.
